Trade/Device Name(s): BD Microtainer® MAP Microtube for Automated Process
Submitter Information: Becton, Dickinson and Company BD Diagnostics, Preanalytical Systems
Specimen Container(s): BD Microtainer® MAP Microtube for Automated Process with K2EDTA
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for BD Microtainer MAP Microtube for Automated Process with K2EDTA used for automated collection, anticoagulation, transport, and storage of blood for hematology and lead testing.
Indications for Use Summary: Used to collect, anticoagulate, transport and store skin puncture blood specimens for measurement of hematological parameters including WBC, RBC, hemoglobin, hematocrit, red cell indices, platelets, white blood cell differentials, reticulocytes, and whole blood lead testing.
